Plot: Set in Brazil, three kids who make a discovery in a garbage dump soon find themselves running from the cops and trying to right a terrible wrong.
Title: Trash
Writer: Andy Mulligan (based on the novel by), Felipe Braga (additional material), Richard Curtis (screenplay)
Actors: Rickson Tevez, Wagner Moura, José Dumont, Daniel Zettel
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.
